name: GitHub Profile Search
desc: I made a visualization of the gun lobby’s $40M+ funding of the U.S. Congress, which I presented in the [NYU Winter 2019 Show for the Recently Possible](https://itp.nyu.edu/shows/winter2019/). Using data from the [Center for Responsive Politics](https://www.opensecrets.org/) & Next.js, the site lets you find your representative, explore by state, & see the bias in funding. ([Project log](https://ima.lachlanjc.com/2019-11-26_cc_final_project/))

name: The Doodler
desc: I’ve built a lot of sites for [Hack Club](https://hackclub.com/) over the years. In January, I made [a proposal](https://www.notion.so/hackclub/A-new-era-for-web-at-Hack-Club-37f224e3b22d43e183eea08aa5c62485) that we build sites around Airtable as a database, with Next.js & [Theme UI](https://theme-ui.com) for the frontend, so they can be more “disposable” as various pieces of startup infrastructure change. In two days, I rebuilt our site indexing high school hackathons with the new methodology.

name: Gitstalk
desc: 2020 was really *a year*, so at the end of the year I returned to a project I’d started at the end of 2019: creating a year in review. I had a lot of fun assembling the story, but especially making the interactive music player for the Music page, visualizing my Activity rings, & all the little design details.

name: QuoteMaster
desc: Just a simple webapp to display my collection of quotes.  Great search feature and ability to copy quotes to your clipboard with one-click

name: Emoji-aid
desc: Just a simple webapp to search for emojis.  With the added ability to click on any emoji and have it copied to your clipboard.

name: WebDev Glossary
desc: A great glossary of webdev terms and there definitions with links.

name: Html Recipes
desc: A great glossary of html snippets, scripts and tips.

name: Code Guide
desc: A great and simple guide to html and css tips and scripts.

name: Awesome Newsletters
desc: A great collection of some of the best programming newsletters.  This site is in the format of awesome repos and is displayed using vuepress.

name: Smolcss
desc: A great guide of css code and snippets.

name: Code Guide
desc: A great search engine to search the awesome list from github user sindhorus.

name: Search Public Apis
desc: Just a simple webapp to display my collection of quotes.  Great search feature and ability to copy quotes to your clipboard with one-click
